us.ba3.me

Class MapInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • us.ba3.me.MapInfo
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DynamicMarkerMapInfo, MarkerMapInfo, VectorMapInfo, VirtualMapInfo

    public class MapInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Describes the attributes of a map. An instance of this class, or a class derived from this class, can be used to add a new map layer using the MapView function addMapUsingMapInfo.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      float alpha
      The alpha value for this map.
      int borderPixelCount
      The number of pixels image tiles for this map have on their borders.
      boolean compressTextures
      Whether or not to compress textures for this map into two-byte formats.
      java.lang.String dataFileName
      For offline file-based maps, the full path and filename of the .map data file.
      java.lang.String defaultTileName
      The name of a cached image to render when the mapping engine is waiting for map content to load.
      boolean isVisible
      Whether or not to make the map visible when it is added.
      MapLoadingStrategy mapLoadingStrategy
      The loading strategy.
      MapType mapType
      The Map's type.
      int maxLevel
      The maximum depth to zoom into this map.
      float maxX
      The maximum longitude of the map data.
      float maxY
      The minimum latitude of the map data.
      float minX
      The minimum longitude of the map data.
      float minY
      The minimum latitude of the map data.
      java.lang.String name
      Unique name of the map.
      java.lang.String sqliteFileName
      For offline file-based maps, the full path and filename of the .sqlite map index file.
      java.lang.String tableNamePrefix
      For file-based maps that merge multiple map index files together, or for existing database that have marker maps injected into them with metool, the prefix for the tables.
      int zOrder
      The zOrder for this map's layer in the MapView.

        Unique name of the map.

        The Map's type.

        public MapLoadingStrategy mapLoadingStrategy
        The loading strategy.

      • sqliteFileName

        public java.lang.String sqliteFileName
        For offline file-based maps, the full path and filename of the .sqlite map index file.

      • tableNamePrefix

        public java.lang.String tableNamePrefix
        For file-based maps that merge multiple map index files together, or for existing database that have marker maps injected into them with metool, the prefix for the tables.

      • dataFileName

        public java.lang.String dataFileName
        For offline file-based maps, the full path and filename of the .map data file.

      • zOrder

        public int zOrder
        The zOrder for this map's layer in the MapView.

      • maxLevel

        public int maxLevel
        The maximum depth to zoom into this map. Maximum values is 22.

      • alpha

        public float alpha
        The alpha value for this map. Range: 0 to 1.

      • isVisible

        public boolean isVisible
        Whether or not to make the map visible when it is added.

      • compressTextures

        public boolean compressTextures
        Whether or not to compress textures for this map into two-byte formats.

      • minX

        public float minX
        The minimum longitude of the map data. Default is -180.

      • minY

        public float minY
        The minimum latitude of the map data. Default is -90.

      • maxX

        public float maxX
        The maximum longitude of the map data. Default is 180.

      • maxY

        public float maxY
        The minimum latitude of the map data. Default is 90.

      • borderPixelCount

        public int borderPixelCount
        The number of pixels image tiles for this map have on their borders.

      • defaultTileName

        public java.lang.String defaultTileName
        The name of a cached image to render when the mapping engine is waiting for map content to load. For example, "grayGrid".
